bookinfo.title: &THIS.PLATFORM; JAIN SLEE &THIS.RA; Resource Adaptor User Guide

abstract.para: &THIS.PLATFORM; JAIN SLEE &THIS.RA; Resource Adaptor (RA) is the JAIN SLEE 1.1 RA for the IMS Gx Interface. Gx reference point is used for provisioning service data flow based charging rules. The reference point is located between the Traffic Plane Function (TPF) and the Charging Rules Function (CRF), also known as Service Data Flow Based Charging Rules Function. It is described in TS29.210 by 3GPP.
This RA implements the Resource Adaptor Type defined by Mobicents development teams.
